name: Slime Hit
description:
*Can you HIT THE SLIME?*

Put your timing and smashing skills to the test in the latest, greatest, most challenging game out there! This game is about to get SLIMY!

Aim, shoot, and hit the slime ball through the rotating wall. Hit the slime ball through the wall’s openings to and make it grow until it breaks through!

But time your shots and aim carefully! Hit the same part of the wall twice and you’ll have to start the level all over. This game will put your timing skills to the test.

*Beat all Slimy Bosses*
Face challenging slime bosses as you shoot your way through Slime Hit’s challenging levels. These Slimy bosses will truly test your skills.

*Collect all Slimes*
As you hit slimes and advance through this free game, you will collect special slimes with unique colors and textures. Choose a slime from your collection to play with before every game!

*Challenging game features*
- Progressively challenging levels make this an addicting game for everyone!
- Unlock SPECIAL slimes as you play!
- Fast and smooth gameplay built for a perfect casual game experience.
- Colorful animation and smooth gameplay mechanics.
- Completely FREE game to play online and offline.
